turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'm trying to track my order, but the tracking number isn't working. It's incredibly frustrating!

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand your frustration. Can you please provide your order number? I'll look into the issue and check on the tracking status for you. Please also confirm the shipping carrier, as this might affect the tracking information available.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, the order number is #12345 and it was shipped with USPS. But honestly, why is the tracking so bad? I ordered this a week ago, and the information is just not updating. Is there any way to know WHERE the package actually is? And why can't you guys just offer a better service?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I apologize for the inconvenience and the poor tracking experience. USPS updates can sometimes be delayed. I am currently checking the latest status with USPS using the order number provided. Unfortunately, specific GPS location data isn't usually available on the tracking page, but I can see that the package is currently in transit and expected to be delivered by the end of the week. We are always looking to improve our shipping partnerships and customer experience; your feedback is valuable. If you still haven't received the package by the end of the week, please let me know, and I will assist you further, which may include a claim.
